name: skopeo

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
skopeo is a command line utility that performs various operations on
container images and image repositories.

dependencies.name: go
dependencies.description: The golang compiler and build environment

dependencies.name: go-md2man
dependencies.description: go-md2man converts markdown into roff (man pages)

dependencies.name: gpgme
dependencies.description:
GPGME is the standard library to access GnuPG functions from programming
languages.

dependencies.name: libassuan
dependencies.description: Libassuan is a small library implementing the so-called Assuan protocol.

dependencies.name: libgpg-error
dependencies.description: Common error values for all GnuPG components.

dependencies.name: lvm2
dependencies.description:
LVM2 is the userspace toolset that provides logical volume management
facilities on linux. To use it you need 3 things: device-mapper in your
kernel, the userspace device-mapper support library (libdevmapper) and
the userspace LVM2 tools (dmsetup). These userspace components, and
associated header files, are provided by this package. See
http://sources.redhat.com/dm/ for additional information about the
device-mapper kernel and userspace components.
